sentence:
[INST] Question: Is the following claim true or false? Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius at sea level.

 (B) False

Answer: [/INST]
answer_neut: False. Water boils at 100 degrees Celsius (212 degrees Fahrenheit) at standard atmospheric pressure
